predicate.note: Frames file for 'generalize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to reduce to a general form

example.name: intransitive
example.text: It [*EXP*-1] 's hard [*] to generalize , but age seems [*-2] to be the best predictor .

example.name: transitive
example.text: It [*EXP*-2] 's hard [*] to generalize about a reasonable price for puts .
